Title: 055: Building and Managing a Successful Data Science Team
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Head of Data Jaco Van Der Berg. You will hear about many different topics in the space of data such as data strategy, data security, data flow within an organization and the single point of truth. You will also get to learn about managing and hiring for a data science team and gain lots of knowledge about the structure of a data team.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/55
